text: thumb Eierpunsch (literally "egg punch") is the German name given to a warm, sweetened alcoholic, egg-based drink similar to egg nog. It is commonly a winter drink and can be found served in the popular Christmas markets of Germany and Austria. Eierpunsch is made with egg yolks, sugar, white wine and vanilla. Sometimes cream or custard can be added. == See also == * * * * * * * ==References== *Eierpunsch Category:Mixed drinks Category:Christmas food Category:Christmas in Germany Category:German cuisine Category:Austrian cuisine Category:Sweet cocktails Category:Cocktails with wine Category:Cocktails with eggs Category:Creamy cocktails
title: Eierpunsch
